question:
You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home, you found you had left some important papers at hotel.

Write a letter to the manager of the hotel. In your letter
-say where you think you left the papers
-explain why they are so important
-tell the manager what you want him/her to do
text: I am writing to inform you that my official network diagram was lost while I was participating in a conference at your motel on the 16th of this month.

As per my realization, I lost it on conference room number 203 as I was carrying this critical document with me to absorb related materials. After returning to my room, as the official meeting was held on that particular day, which took my attention away from this document.

That report contains the IT structure of my bank, which could create havoc in the financial industry, in case, it goes to corrupt hands; therefore, your kind attention is required to regain this evidence back, which will be beneficial to save my job. Moreover, it is an original report that ought not to be misplaced.

Checking lost stuff that was deposited by your staff on that day at your motel must assist, and my offer for returning this evidence for your employee is $500. My next visit to your resort is on the 25th of this month.

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
